sense.def:
To pursue an activity, interest, or plan
pomeni ukvarjati se z neko dejavnostjo ali področjem, ki nas zanima, oziroma uresničevati neki načrt.

seg.quote: Lyttleton pursued a policy of peace and order.
His wealth enabled him to pursue his passionate interest in art.

sense.def:
To pursue a particular aim or result
pomeni truditi se, da bi dosegli določen cilj ali rezultat, pogosto dalj časa.

seg.quote: Economic growth must not be pursued at the expense of environmental pollution.

sense.def:
To pursue a particular topic
pomeni poskušati izvedeti več o določeni zadevi.

seg.quote: I don't want to pursue that question now.

sense.def:
To pursue someone or something
pomeni iti za nekom ali nečim, navadno zato, da bi ga ujeli.

seg.quote: The police pursued the wrong car.
He managed to give his pursuers the slip.
